thread.title: Sushi donuts will make your Instagram feed a little more delicious in 2017
thread.title_full: Sushi donuts will make your Instagram feed a little more delicious in 2017

author: Christine Wang
title: Sushi donuts will make your Instagram feed a little more delicious in 2017

locations.name: indonesia west mall lvl 3a - kota kasablanka

organizations.name: blue crab roll w/ hennessy cream sauce

text:
It's a new year. And you know what they say: new year, new sushi creation.
Time to say goodbye to sushi burritos and prepare yourself for the Instagram flood of this next mashup: sushi donuts.
SEE ALSO: The sushi croissant is the most California thing to ever happen, ever 
SUSHI DONUTS! Do I need to say more? And what's fishy about these donuts is that they are filled with avocado, crab meat, or spicy tuna inside!! What a sweet surprise!! üòçüòçüòç these sushi donuts can be found at @projectpokeco in Fountain Valley! #projectpoke #sushi #donuts #oceats #ocfoodies 
A post shared by Janet Jen (@foodiexbun) on Feb 21, 2017 at 6:46pm PST 
Been seeing these sushi donuts all over my Facebook feed: thoughts on this new trendy food? Leave a comment below! üç£üç© Location: Project Poke, Fountain Valley, CA üì∑: @nonstopeats and @sushitooth . . . #foodporn #sushi #yummy #instagood #foodie #foodstagram #foodphotography #sushidonut #donut #sashimi #japanesefood #instayum #instafood #eats # ats #eatingfortheinsta #californiaeats #calieats #laeats 
A post shared by Sam (@indulgentfoodgal) on Feb 21, 2017 at 3:55pm PST 
Unlike other new, more questionable,sushi products ( sushi croissants and Kit-Kat sushi , just to name a few) this is a creation that we actually want to eat and we want it immediately.
Project Poke, located in California, is one place that serves them up and their popularity is on rise thanks to their recent feature on Insider . On their Instagram , they recently posted a fascinating video showing how the donut is made.
Watch how our SUSHI DONUTS are made üç£üç© A sushi rice donut stuffed with avocado, spicy tuna or imitation crab meat and topped with all kinds of sushi goodness üôåüèº Come get yours today! ü§ó #projectpoke üì∑: @dailyfoodfeed 
A post shared by ProjectPoke ‚ãÖ OPEN 11 - 9PM (@projectpokeco) on Feb 18, 2017 at 10:17am PST 
Project Poke is not the only place that makes sushi donuts, however.
California Sushi Donuts also dishes out a mean sushi donut, and can be found at food markets, pop-ups and expos all around Southern California. They take their donuts to the next level by giving them all the crazy colors we usually see on regular donuts.
@californiasushidonuts #sushidonut 
A post shared by Giovanni Derenzo (@giovanni_derenzo) on Jan 28, 2017 at 7:29pm PST 
#626nightmarket get ready! Build your own California Sushi Donut. Tell us how you would build yours!! üå¥üç£üç© 
A post shared by California Sushi Donuts üå¥üç£üç© (@californiasushidonuts) on Aug 29, 2016 at 11:26am PDT 
They also make a sushi donut that is covered with a Hennessy Cream Sauce.
What is life?
Blue Crab Roll w/ Hennessy Cream Sauce perfectly paired with Hennessy VSOP üì∏: @ryanthomaswayne 
A post shared by California Sushi Donuts üå¥üç£üç© (@californiasushidonuts) on Nov 16, 2016 at 11:15am PST 
There's also a place called Sushigroove in Indonesia that has sushi donuts on the menu, among other scrumptious looking sushi options.
Don't have any plan for your #sunday ?! Call your friends, meet them at Sushigroove! ‚Ä¢ See you at: - Grand Indonesia West Mall Lvl 3A - Kota Kasablanka GF - Mal Taman Anggrek LvL 5 - Pondok Indah Mall 2 - Restaurant Row Lvl 3 - Setiabudi 1 GF - Paris Van Java (Bandung) GF ‚Ä¢ üì∑: @adhefeb ‚Ä¢ #groovylikeme #creatingthegoodlife #ismaya #japanese #goodsushiforeveryone 
A post shared by SUSHIGROOVE (@sushigroove) on Jan 14, 2017 at 9:42pm PST 
January 1st 2017, Page 1 of 365. ‚Ä¢ How's your new year eve last night?! Come, recharge with our platter of hapinness; Sushi Donuts! ‚Ä¢ üì∑: @michaelblisss ‚Ä¢ #groovylikeme #creatingthegoodlife #ismaya #sushidonut 
A post shared by SUSHIGROOVE (@sushigroove) on Jan 1, 2017 at 2:33am PST 
There's also a place in Toronto called Square Fish that claims it is the "home of Doshi (Donut Sushi)." 
We think it looks more like a sushi sandwich, but we would definitely still eat.
TGIF! Treat yourself with a DOSHI! Crispy rice bottom with cheddar cheese, seaweed salad, crab meat, edamame, corn, mango, and then topped with your favourite fish! Repost @blogto 
A post shared by Square Fish (@squarefish_to) on Jan 20, 2017 at 11:45am PST 
Even Italy is getting in on the sushi donut action. SushiBurrito in Palermo introduced them onto their menu this year.
COMING SOON 2017 SUSHIDONUT!!! üòç #gnampalermo #food #foodporn #foodie #foodphotography #foodstagram #foodforthought #foodlover #foodgasm #foodpics #foods #foodblogger #foodforfoodies #chef #sushiburrito #sushi #burrito #followforfollow #cucinare #cuisine #sicily #like4like #palermofood #ognitantocucino #cucinandoarte #top_art_food #italiainunoscatto #siciliapedipedi #summer #instafood 
A post shared by Roberto Bond√≠ (@pisellino_mcn) on Dec 28, 2016 at 12:17pm PST 
Now that sushi donuts are rising to the top of Instagram, copycats will of course flock to the trend to try to create their own. But when they look this delicious, we aren't mad about it at all.
Please, world, make all of the sushi donuts so we can have the pleasure of eating and looking. Thank you.
DREAMS AND DEDICATION ARE A POWERFUL COMBINATION. World, meet sushi donut. üç©üç£üç± 
A post shared by jenna marie (@jennasingzz) on Feb 20, 2017 at 2:43pm PST 
BONUS: Someone decided to make Lego-inspired square burgers
